work for tons and tons of pages where it starts to fall down is if you have
multiple updates like per second but if you are constantly putting things up and
tearing them down and doing rebuilds then at a certain point you're kind of
you're gonna spend so much on rebuilding the site that it would just make sense
to have a server but that that's a problem that we're attempting to solve
